title: User Registration Success
description: Verify that a new user can successfully register with valid details.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Enter valid user information including email, username, and password.
Submit the registration form.
Confirm user registration is successful and user is redirected appropriately.

title: User Registration with Invalid Email
description: Verify the system shows an error when registering with an invalid email format.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Enter invalid email, valid username, and password.
Submit the registration form.
Verify that an email format validation error message is displayed.

title: Login Success
description: Verify that a registered user can login with correct credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid registered email and password.
Click the login button.
Confirm user is successfully logged in and redirected to the Dashboard.

title: Login Failure with Incorrect Password
description: Verify login fails when user enters an incorrect password.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter registered email and incorrect password.
Click the login button.
Verify an error message about incorrect credentials is displayed.

title: Password Reset Workflow
description: Verify that the password reset process completes successfully via email.

steps.description: Navigate to the password reset page.
Submit a registered email address.
Verify that a password reset email is sent.
Follow the reset link and set a new password.
Confirm password is successfully updated and user can login with new password.

title: Dashboard Metric Accuracy
description: Verify that the Dashboard displays accurate and up-to-date user metrics and recent activity.

steps.description: Login as an active user with recorded workout data.
Navigate to the Dashboard page.
Check that weekly progress, key metrics, and recent activities are displayed correctly.

title: AI Coach Personalized Plan Delivery
description: Verify AI Coach provides personalized workout plans based on user input and profile data.

steps.description: Login and access the AI Coach chat interface.
Submit user goals and preferences through chat.
Verify AI responds with a customized workout plan and fitness insights.

title: Workout Creation and Tracking
description: Ensure users can create workouts, add exercises, track progress, and complete workout sessions.

steps.description: Login and navigate to the Workout Management section.
Create a new workout with multiple exercises.
Start the workout and track exercise completion.
Verify workout exercises update progress correctly and workouts can be marked complete.

title: Automatic Workout Generation
description: Check that the system correctly generates a workout automatically based on user preferences.

steps.description: Access automatic workout generation in the workout section.
Input desired workout duration and focus areas.
Submit parameters to generate a workout.
Verify a workout is generated that matches the input preferences.

title: Appointment Scheduling and Management
description: Validate that users can schedule, reschedule, and cancel appointments and view them on the calendar.

steps.description: Login and navigate to the Schedule page.
Create a new appointment using the calendar interface.
Verify the appointment appears in the calendar and upcoming appointments list.
Reschedule the appointment to a different date/time.
Confirm the appointment is updated accordingly.
Cancel the appointment.
Verify the appointment is removed from the calendar and upcoming appointments.

title: User Profile Update and Goal Tracking
description: Ensure updates to user profile information, goals, and achievements are saved and displayed correctly.

steps.description: Login and navigate to the Profile & Settings section.
Update profile fields, add a new goal, and mark an achievement.
Save changes.
Verify updates persist and are correctly rendered throughout the application.

title: Notes System Functionality
description: Verify users can add, edit, and delete personal workout notes without errors.

steps.description: Login and navigate to the Notes section.
Create a new note.
Confirm the note is saved and displayed correctly.
Edit the note content.
Verify edited content is saved and updated correctly.
Delete the note.
Confirm the note is removed from the system.

title: Workout Timer Accuracy and Integration
description: Verify the workout timer counts time accurately and integrates with workout sessions.

steps.description: Start a workout session with the timer enabled.
Start the timer and let it run for a specified duration.
Verify the timer counts accurately and matches real elapsed time.
Pause and resume the timer during the workout.
Ensure timer controls work correctly without time loss.
Stop the timer and complete the workout.
Verify session duration is recorded and linked to workout data.

title: Subscription Management Workflow
description: Validate subscription plan selection, payment processing, and subscription status updates.

steps.description: Login and navigate to the Subscriptions page.
View available subscription plans.
Select a premium subscription plan and proceed to payment.
Complete the payment process.
Verify subscription status is updated to active premium.
Cancel the subscription.
Ensure subscription status updates to reflect cancellation.

title: Route Protection for Authenticated Areas
description: Ensure protected routes are inaccessible to unauthenticated users and redirect to login.

steps.description: Attempt to navigate directly to a protected route (e.g. Dashboard) without logging in.
Verify unauthenticated user is redirected to the login page.
Login with valid credentials.
Attempt to access the protected route again.
Verify the route is accessible after authentication.

title: Multi-language Support Verification
description: Verify UI elements and text appropriately change according to selected language and no content breaks occur.

steps.description: Navigate to language settings.
Switch language from default (e.g. English) to another language (e.g. Italian).
Verify UI text updates properly in the selected language throughout key pages.
Switch back to the original language.
Confirm text changes back accordingly with no UI breakage.

title: Mobile Responsiveness and Capacitor Integration
description: Verify that the application UI renders correctly and functions on major mobile devices using Capacitor.

steps.description: Launch the app on iOS and Android devices.
Verify UI adjusts responsively without scrolling or layout breakage.
Perform typical user flows such as login, navigation, workout tracking, and scheduling.
Ensure all flows work without errors or crashes.

title: QR Code Generation and Display
description: Validate that QR codes are generated correctly and rendered in relevant contexts.

steps.description: Trigger QR code generation for a specific workout or appointment.
Verify the QR code is generated and displayed correctly.
Scan the QR code using a QR code reader.
Confirm scanned information matches the intended workout or appointment details.

title: UI Consistency Using Reusable Components
description: Ensure the UI components render consistently and conform to design across various pages and devices.

steps.description: Open multiple application pages including Dashboard, AI Coach, Workouts, Schedule, and Profile.
Verify consistent styling, spacing, and interaction of UI elements based on the Shadcn/ui component library.

title: Logout Functionality
description: Verify users can logout securely from the application and session data is cleared.

steps.description: Login to the application.
Click the logout button or link.
Verify the user is securely logged out, session cleaned, and redirected to the login or landing page.
